pages.text: Used alongside a Kabuto Rider's transformation device to transform into that Rider$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:kabuto/mobs/zectrooper)ZECTroopers$(/l)' equipment$(li)$(l:kabuto/mobs/shadow_trooper)Shadow Troopers$(/l)' equipment$(li)$(l:kabuto/mobs/neotrooper)Neotroopers$(/l)' equipment$(li)$(l:kabuto/mobs/caucasus)Kamen Rider Caucasus$(/l)'s equipment
